Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, directly in front of the drawbridge used to enter the magnificent Lyanden Castle, on the mirror lake to the east.
Room.LongDescription: The Lyanden Castle is the political center of the City of Oceancrest. All foreign affairs are conducted from the castle. There are many diplomats from the various cultures around Oceancrest wandering about the street, waiting to meet with the High Lord Chamberlain.
